content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded due to resource shortages and placement errors.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Misuse  
  – Avoid supplying unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Use the correct signature to retrieve entities.

• Unchecked None Iteration  
  – Verify that get_entities returns a valid (non‐None) collection before attempting to iterate over its results.

• Lab Placement Without Inventory  
  – Confirm that the Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement at a specific location.

• Lab Crafting Failures Due to Missing Sub‐Ingredients  
  – Ensure that all required components (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or craftable. Verify the completeness of the resource dependency chain (including necessary smelting steps) before initiating Lab production.
